entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is teaching the class and is present in the scene. He roars with excitement when Harry successfully rides Buckbeak.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person who is part of the Slytherin group and is known for his disdainful behavior. He takes over Buckbeak after Harry rides it successfully.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a person who is part of the Slytherin group and is present in the scene. He is one of Malfoy's friends.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a person who is part of the Slytherin group and is present in the scene. He is one of Malfoy's friends.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff that is being ridden by Harry and later taken over by Malfoy. It bows to its riders.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who successfully rides Buckbeak with Hagrid's help. He watches Ron and Hermione practice riding another hippogriff.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is part of Harry's group and is practicing riding a chestnut hippogriff with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is part of Harry's group and is practicing riding a chestnut hippogriff with Ron.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a person who is part of the class and is trying to ride a hippogriff, but it doesn't seem to want to bend its knees.

relationships.description: Hagrid helps Harry ride Buckbeak successfully. He unties the hippogriffs one by one and encourages everyone to try riding them.
Harry rides Buckbeak successfully with Hagrid's help. He feels a heavy thud as the hippogriff hits the ground.
Malfoy takes over Buckbeak after Harry rides it successfully. He pats the hippogriff's beak and looks disdainful.
Ron practices riding a chestnut hippogriff with Hermione. Harry watches them from the sidelines.
Hermione practices riding a chestnut hippogriff with Ron. Harry watches them from the sidelines.
Neville tries to ride a hippogriff, but it doesn't seem to want to bend its knees. He bows to the hippogriff instead.
